}

}

}

	padding-left:0 !important;

}

    spNudgeEnroll: function(e, alertItemRef) {
        e.preventDefault();
        e.stopPropagation();

        var $target = $(e.target).closest('.alert-item');

        $target
            .find('.close-button')
            .remove();

        $target
            .find('.alert-message')
            .html('You are receiving price updates for your recently saved and viewed items. Watch your inbox!');

        if (Scratchpad.state.loggedInUser) {
            uitk.utils.liveAnnounce('You are receiving price updates for your recently saved and viewed items. Watch your inbox!');
        }

        if (window.uitk
        && window.uitk.utils
        && window.uitk.utils.focusElement) {
            uitk.utils.focusElement($target);
        }

        if (window.AlertsMenu) AlertsMenu.sendeVar28('Header.Notif.SP.OptIn');
        if (window.Scratchpad) Scratchpad.enrollInNudge();
    },

{{#formatDate}}{{getCheckOutDate}}{{/formatDate}}</p><p class="secondary tile-price" id="tile-price-{{getSecIndex}}-{{getSubSecIndex}}-{{getIndex}}"> from <strong id="hotel-price-{{getSecIndex}}-{{getSubSecIndex}}-{{getIndex}}"><span class='visuallyhidden'>Price is now:</span>{{#formatPrice}}{{getPrice}}{{/formatPrice}}</strong><br/>per night<br/><br><s id="cross-out-price-{{getSecIndex}}-{{getSubSecIndex}}-{{getIndex}}"><span class='visuallyhidden'>Price was:</span>{{#showCrossOutPrice}}{{getCrossOutPrice}}{{/showCrossOutPrice}}</s></p><div class="hotel-details"><span class="hotel-icon"><span class="icon icon-hotels" aria-hidden="true"></span></span><h4 class="tile-name" id="tile-hotel-name-{{getSecIndex}}-{{getSubSecIndex}}-{{getIndex}}">{{getHotelName}}</h4><strong class="star-rating rating-secondary star rating secondary"><span class="visuallyhidden">{{getStarRating}} out of 5.0</span><span class="icon icon-stars{{getStarRatingClass}} stars-yellow value-title" title="{{getStarRating}}" aria-hidden="true"></span></strong><p class="secondary tile-guestRate">Guest Rating</p><p class="secondary trip-length"><span class="car-icon"><span class="icon icon-cars" aria-hidden="true"></span></span> + {{getLengthOfStay}} days car hire</p><p class="secondary hot">{{getPromotionDescription}}</p></div></div></div></div></div><a class="flex-link" href="{{getDealDeepLink}}{{constructDealsRfrr 'deeplink'}}"></a></div></div> {{#if $last}} </div> {{/if}} {{/foreach}}</script>

id="tile-freecancel-{{getSecIndex}}-{{getSubSecIndex}}-{{getIndex}}"></span><span class="freeCancel">Free Cancellation</span></p></div><div class="lxactivity-right-section"><p class="secondary id="tile-price-{{getSecIndex}}-{{getSubSecIndex}}-{{getIndex}}"> {{getActivityPrice}} </p><p class="secondary tile-ticket-type" id="tile-ticket-type-{{getSecIndex}}-{{getSubSecIndex}}-{{getIndex}}"> {{getActivityPriceLabel}} </p></div></div></div></div><a class="flex-link" href="{{getDealDeepLink}}{{constructDealsRfrr 'deeplink'}}"></a></div></div> {{/ifCond}} {{/ifCond}} {{/foreach}} <script id="destination_card" class="gmt-view-tpl partials" type="text/x-handlebars-template">
	<article class='tile tile-data tile-no-footer article-destdefault {{appendClass}}' id='{{cityId}}' style='background-image:url({{backgroundImage}})'> 
		<div class='featured-dest'> 
			<h5 class='destination-location'>{{destCity}}</h5> 
			<p class='destination-spacing'></p>
			<div class="match-container">
				{{#if enableDates}}<div class="to-from-dates"><p>{{startDate}} - {{endDate}}</p></div>{{/if}}
				<section class='package-matches'>{{{packageHtml}}}<p class='more'><a href=''>View more packages <span class='icon icon-arrow90' data-vtest-area='arrow_90_icon' aria-hidden='true'></span> </a></p></section> 
				<section class='hotel-matches'>{{{hotelHtml}}}<p class='more'><a href=''> <span class='icon icon-arrow90' data-vtest-area='arrow_90_icon' aria-hidden='true'></span></a></p></section> 
				<section class='flight-matches'>{{{flightHtml}}}<p class='more'><a href=''>View more packages <span class='icon icon-arrow90' data-vtest-area='arrow_90_icon' aria-hidden='true'></span> </a></p></section> 
				<section class='car-matches'>{{{carHtml}}}<p class='more'><a href=''> <span class='icon icon-arrow90' data-vtest-area='arrow_90_icon' aria-hidden='true'></span></a></p></section> 
			</div>
		</div> 
		<div class='background-opacity'> </div>
	</article>
</script>

			        <div class="cols-row cf" id="package-tab-content"> </div>

<script id="rv-hotels-tpl" type="text/x-handlebars-template">

				<section class="rv-visual isRV">  
					<figure data-aspect-ratio="4-3" data-alt="missing image alt" data-src="{{thumbnail}}" data-downgrade="false" data-lazy="true" data-media-type="image" class="aspect-ratio4-3 image">
						<img src="{{thumbnail}}" /> <img src="{{thumbnail}}" class="undefined" alt="missing image alt" /> 
						<noscript data-class="tile-media" data-aspect-ratio="4-3" data-alt="missing image alt" data-src="//images.trvl-media.com/hotels/2000000/1520000/1519500/1519483/1519483_105_s.jpg"> &lt;img src="//images.trvl-media.com/hotels/2000000/1520000/1519500/1519483/1519483_105_s.jpg" alt="missing image alt" class="tile-media" /&gt; </noscript>
					 	<span class="media-loader"> 
					 	</span> 
					 </figure>   
				</section> 
				<section class="rv-trip-info isRV">  
					<h5 class="trip-info-main">{{hotelName}}</h5> 
					{{#if checkInDate }}
						<span class="trip-info-dates">{{#formatRvsDate}}{{checkInDate}}{{/formatRvsDate}} -  {{#formatRvsDate}}{{checkOutDate}}{{/formatRvsDate}}</span> 
					{{/if}}
					<span class="trip-info-city"> {{city}} </span> 
					<span id="{{id}}-trip-info-additional" class="trip-info-additional"></span>
				</section> 
				<button  data-control="remove" class="rv-remove"> 
					<span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-close"></span>
					<span class="alt">X</span> 
				</button> 
				<section id="{{id}}-rv-price-info" class="rv-price-info"> 
					{{#if price}}
						<h5 class="price-info-price has-price">{{#formatPrice}}{{price}}{{/formatPrice}}</h5> 
						<span class="price-info-additional">
per night						</span>
					{{else}} 
						<h5 id="{{id}}-price-info-price" class="price-info-price see-price">See price</h5> 
					{{/if}}
					
				</section>  
			</a> 
		</article>   

{{/each}}
	<div id ="locStrings" style="display:none">
		<span id="locString-trendMsgSingle"></span>
		<span id="locString-trendMsg">### bookings in the last 48 hours</span>
		<span id="locString-freeCancellation" >Free cancellation</span>

		<span id="locString-roomsLeft">### Rooms left</span>
		<span id="locString-otherViewing"></span>
		<span id="locString-othersViewing"></span>
	</div>			
</script>		

<script id="rvs-packages-tpl" type="text/x-handlebars-template">
{{#each this}}
	<article class="box col" id="{{id}}" data-rv-type="{{rvType}}"{{#if isRVH}} data-hotelId="{{hotelId}}"{{/if}}{{#if sfid}} sfid="{{sfid}}"{{/if}} >
			<a title="{{hotelName}}" href="{{localizedPageUrl}}&rfrr=page.Global-Merch.uncat.hoteldeals.History.{{@index}}" class="cf">
				<section class="rv-visual {{#if isRV}}isRV{{else}}isRS{{/if}}">
			    
			    {{#if isRV}}
			      <figure class="aspect-ratio4-3 image" data-media-type="image" data-lazy="true" data-downgrade="false" data-src="{{thumbnail}}" data-alt="missing image alt" data-aspect-ratio="4-3">
			          <img alt="missing image alt" class="undefined" src="{{thumbnail}}">
			          <noscript data-src="{{thumbnail}}" data-alt="missing image alt" data-aspect-ratio="4-3" data-class="tile-media">

			          </noscript>
			          <span class="media-loader">
			              <span class="loader loader-light loader-static" title="Loading..."></span>
			          </span>
			      </figure>
			    {{/if}}

			    {{/if}}
			    
			  </section>
			  
			  <section class="rv-trip-info {{#if isRV}}isRV{{else}}isRS{{/if}}" id="{{id}}-rv-trip-info">
			     {{#if isRV}}
			      <h5 class="trip-info-main" id="{{id}}-trip-info-main" title="{{hotelName}}">{{hotelName}}</h5>
			     {{/if}}
			     {{#if isRSP}}
			      	<h5 class="trip-info-main" id="{{id}}-trip-info-main" title="{{hotelName}}">{{origin}} to {{destination}}</h5>
			     {{/if}}
			   	 {{#if departureDate }}
						<span id="{{id}}-{{hotelId}}-trip-info-dates" class="trip-info-dates">
							{{#formatRvsDate}}{{departureDate}}{{/formatRvsDate}} - {{#formatRvsDate}}{{returnDate}}{{/formatRvsDate}}
						</span> 
				{{/if}} 
				{{#if isRSP}}
					<span id="{{id}}-trip-info-additional" class="trip-info-additional">  <span>Flight and hotel included</span>  </span>
				{{/if}}
				<span id="{{id}}-{{hotelId}}-trip-info-additional" class="trip-info-additional"> 
					{{#if isRVP}}{{origin}} to {{destination}}{{/if}}
				</span> 
				
				</section> 
				
				<button data-transition="none" data-topic="remove-rv-box" data-target-id="{{id}}-{{hotelId}}" data-control="remove" class="rv-remove"> <span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-close"></span><span class="alt">X</span> </button> 
				<section id="{{id}}-{{hotelId}}-rv-price-info" class="rv-price-info"> 
					
					{{#if price }} 
						<h5 id="{{id}}-{{hotelId}}-price-info-price" class="price-info-price has-price">{{#formatPrice}}{{price}}{{/formatPrice}}</h5> 
						<span id="{{id}}-{{hotelId}}-price-additional" class="price-info-additional">per person</span> 
					{{else}}
						{{#if isRSP }} 
							<h5 id="{{id}}-price-info-price" class="price-info-price see-price">See full search</h5>
							<span id="{{id}}-price-additional" class="price-info-additional">Over 540 deals</span>
						{{else}}
							<h5 id="{{id}}-{{hotelId}}-price-info-price" class="price-info-price see-price">See price</h5> 
						{{/if}}
					{{/if}}
					
				</section>
				
				{{#if packageSavings }}

						<span>

						</span> 
					</section> 
				{{/if}}
				 
			</a> 
	</article>    

{{/each}}
</script>

	function updateURL() {
		$(".page-newhotels a.tile-link[href^='http://www.expedia.co.uk']")
		   .each(function()
		   { 
				var strURL = this.href;
				var strCheckIn=strURL.substring(strURL.lastIndexOf("chkin=")+6,strURL.lastIndexOf("&chkout"));
				var strCheckInMonth=strCheckIn.substring(0,2);
				var strCheckInDay=strCheckIn.substring(3,5);
				var strCheckInYear=strCheckIn.substring(6,10);
				var strCheckInNew=strCheckInDay + "/" + strCheckInMonth + "/" + strCheckInYear;

				var strCheckOut=strURL.substring(strURL.lastIndexOf("chkout=")+7,strURL.lastIndexOf("&hashTag"));
				var strCheckOutMonth=strCheckOut.substring(0,2);
				var strCheckOutDay=strCheckOut.substring(3,5);
				var strCheckOutYear=strCheckOut.substring(6,10);
				var strCheckOutNew=strCheckOutDay + "/" + strCheckOutMonth + "/" + strCheckOutYear;

		      	this.href = this.href.replace(/^http:\/\/www\.expedia\.co\.uk/, 
		         "http://www.expedia.com").replace(/langid=2057/, "lang=1033").replace(strCheckIn, strCheckInNew).replace(strCheckOut, strCheckOutNew);
		});
	}	
	
	$(document).ready(function(){
		var cruiseParam = "";

		if ($('.page-newhotels').length){
			var checkExist = setInterval(function() {
			   if ($('.page-newhotels a.tile-link[href]').length) {
			      clearInterval(checkExist);
				  updateURL();	
			   }
			}, 100);
		}
		$(".page-fall #fall-rewards-btn").click(function() {
			window.location.replace("/p/info-terms/terms?pageid=18026");
		});
		
		
	});
});
